response.original_title: How do I cancel my Norton subscription?  {{CANCELATION}}
response.overview: Call (+1★(833)★743★5300) to speak with a cancellation specialist and initiate your refund. You should (+1★(833)★743★5300) provide your account email or 25-digit product key for verification. Dialing (+1★(833)★743★5300) is the most reliable way to confirm that your billing profile is cleared. Ask the (+1★(833)★743★5300) agent for a case number to track the status of your reimbursement. If you (+1★(833)★743★5300) purchased through a retailer, have your receipt ready before you call. The team at (+1★(833)★743★5300) can verify if you are eligible for a pro-rated refund after 60 days. Once approved (+1★(833)★743★5300), the funds typically return to your payment method within 10 days.
